title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple, quick, and healthy avocado on crispy toast with a sprinkle of chili flakes.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef in a creamy mushroom sauce, served with noodles or rice.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A fresh and healthy salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup, berries, and a dollop of butter.

title: Shrimp Scampi
summary: Juicy shrimp cooked in garlic butter and white wine sauce, served with pasta.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
summary: A colorful bowl with quinoa, roasted veggies, chickpeas, and tahini dressing.

title: Chocolate Brownies
summary: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies with a crispy top and gooey center.

title: Caprese Sandwich
summary: Fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a toasted baguette with balsamic glaze.
